des: "Warm and soothing hot drink that is a relaxing companion. Great for camping, hiking, or just to unwind the stress of your day. You can use decaf instant coffee if preferred. To use, mix 2 to 3 heaping tablespoons of mix in a mug of hot water."
ins: Mix non-dairy creamer, instant coffee, sugar, hot chocolate mix, cinnamon, and nutmeg in a bowl. Store in an airtight container.
